channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 31

item.title: By: Monday Go Meditation: Game 32 | BenGoZen
item.dc:creator: Monday Go Meditation: Game 32 | BenGoZen
item.description: […] with another 3 dan! This time I am playing White and actually manage to legitimately win! (Though last week's game is technically a legitimate win, I feel like I was lucky with the capturing race on the right.) […]
item.content:encoded: […] with another 3 dan! This time I am playing White and actually manage to legitimately win! (Though last week's game is technically a legitimate win, I feel like I was lucky with the capturing race on the right.) […]

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! It was a tough decision at the time. I'm glad you enjoyed it!
item.content:encoded: Thanks! It was a tough decision at the time. I’m glad you enjoyed it!

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: Congratulations! That is really cool. That ko was so huge it would have been almost impossible for him to win it, you made a good choice in not responding.
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! That is really cool. That ko was so huge it would have been almost impossible for him to win it, you made a good choice in not responding.
